Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Intakes.Modules

Interface IntakeModuleIO

public interface IntakeModuleIO
Interface for the Intake Module Input/Output (IO) layer. Defines methods to interact with and control the intake mechanism, including setting states, managing positions, and obtaining sensor data.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    IntakeModuleIO.IntakeIOInputs
    Inner class representing the inputs to the intake module.

    • updateInputs

      default void updateInputs(IntakeModuleIO.IntakeIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the input values of the intake module.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The inputs to update.

    • setIntakeState

      default void setIntakeState(IntakeState state)
      Sets the overall state of the intake mechanism.
      Parameters:
      state - The desired state of the intake mechanism.

    • setSingleModeState

      default void setSingleModeState(IntakeState state)
      Sets the intake mechanism to operate in single mode.
      Parameters:
      state - The desired state for single mode.

    • setPivotingModeState

      default void setPivotingModeState(IntakeState state)
      Sets the intake mechanism to operate in pivoting mode.
      Parameters:
      state - The desired state for pivoting mode.

    • setAngle

      default void setAngle(double rotations)
      Sets the pivot angle of the intake mechanism.
      Parameters:
      rotations - The desired angle in rotations.

    • setVelocity

      default void setVelocity(double speedInMPS, double mechanismCircumference, boolean isOpen)
      Sets the velocity of the intake roller.
      Parameters:
      speedInMPS - The desired velocity in meters per second.
      mechanismCircumference - The circumference of the roller mechanism.
      isOpen - Whether the roller should be operating in open-loop mode.

    • holdPos

      default void holdPos(double rot)
      Holds the pivot mechanism at a specific position.
      Parameters:
      rot - The desired position in rotations.

    • stop

      default void stop()
      Stops all movement of the intake mechanism.

    • getState

      default IntakeState getState()
      Gets the current state of the intake mechanism.
      Returns:
      The current state.

    • getPosition

      default Rotation2d getPosition()
      Gets the current pivot position of the intake mechanism.
      Returns:
      The current pivot angle as a Rotation2d object.

    • getVelocity

      default double getVelocity()
      Gets the current velocity of the intake roller.
      Returns:
      The current velocity in meters per second.
